schemes.title: PM-KISAN Samman Nidhi Yojana
schemes.description: Financial assistance of Rs. 6000 per year to small and marginal farmers
schemes.fullDescription: The Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN) is a Central Sector Scheme launched on 1st December 2018. Under this scheme, financial assistance of Rs. 6000 per year is provided to small and marginal farmers in three equal instalments of Rs. 2000 each every four months.
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers with cultivable land up to 2 hectares
Farmers who own cultivable land as per land records of the concerned State/UT
Land should be owned by individual farmer families
schemes.benefits: Rs. 6000 per year in three instalments of Rs. 2000 each
schemes.applicationProcess: Online registration through PM-KISAN portal or through Common Service Centers

schemes.title: Ayushman Bharat - Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana
schemes.description: Health insurance coverage of Rs. 5 lakhs per family per year
schemes.fullDescription: Ayushman Bharat is the flagship scheme of Government of India to achieve the vision of Universal Health Coverage. The scheme provides health cover of Rs. 5 lakhs per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization.
eligibility: Families identified through Socio Economic Caste Census (SECC) 2011
Families listed in SECC database under deprivation categories
Occupational category families in rural and urban areas
schemes.benefits: Health insurance coverage up to Rs. 5 lakhs per family per year
schemes.applicationProcess: Beneficiaries can get their eligibility checked and cards made at hospitals or through Common Service Centers
schemes.department: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare

schemes.title: Beti Bachao Beti Padhao Scheme
schemes.description: Initiative to improve child sex ratio and enable education of girl children
schemes.fullDescription: Beti Bachao Beti Padhao is a social campaign of the Government of India that aims to address the declining child sex ratio and related issues of women empowerment over a life-cycle continuum.
eligibility: Girl child born on or after 22nd January 2015
Account can be opened until girl child attains the age of 10 years
Only one account per girl child allowed
schemes.benefits: Various financial incentives and educational support for girl child development
schemes.applicationProcess: Applications can be made through banks, post offices or online portals
schemes.department: Ministry of Women and Child Development

schemes.title: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana - Urban
schemes.description: Affordable housing scheme for urban poor and middle-income groups
schemes.fullDescription: PMAY-U aims to provide pucca houses to all eligible families in urban areas by 2022. The scheme provides central assistance to implementing agencies through States/UTs for providing houses to eligible beneficiaries.
eligibility: Families without pucca house in their name
Adult women member should be co-owner of the house
Household income limits as per different categories
schemes.benefits: Financial assistance up to Rs. 2.67 lakhs for house construction/purchase
schemes.applicationProcess: Online application through PMAY-U portal or offline through implementing agencies
schemes.department: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs

schemes.title: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act
schemes.description: 100 days guaranteed employment for rural households
schemes.fullDescription: MGNREGA guarantees 100 days of wage employment in a financial year to a rural household whose adult members volunteer to do unskilled manual work.
eligibility: Rural households
Adult members willing to do unskilled manual work
Job card holders
schemes.benefits: 100 days guaranteed employment with minimum wages
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply through Gram Panchayat or MGNREGA portal

schemes.title: Atal Pension Yojana
schemes.description: Pension scheme for unorganized sector workers
schemes.fullDescription: APY is a pension scheme for citizens of India focused on the unorganised sector workers. Under APY, guaranteed minimum pension of Rs. 1000 or Rs. 2000 or Rs. 3000 or Rs. 4000 or Rs. 5000 per month will be given at the age of 60 years.
eligibility: Age between 18-40 years
Bank account holder
Indian citizen
Not a member of any statutory social security scheme
schemes.benefits: Guaranteed pension from Rs. 1000 to Rs. 5000 per month after 60 years
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply through banks or online portals

schemes.title: Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan
schemes.fullDescription: Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan is India's flagship programme for universalization of elementary education in a mission mode. It covers the entire country and addresses the needs of 192 million children in 1.1 million habitations.
eligibility: Children aged 6-14 years
All children irrespective of caste, creed, religion or gender
Special focus on girl children and disadvantaged groups
schemes.benefits: Free and compulsory education, textbooks, uniforms, and midday meals
schemes.applicationProcess: Admission through nearest government or government-aided school

schemes.title: Indira Gandhi National Disability Pension Scheme
schemes.description: Financial assistance for persons with disabilities
schemes.fullDescription: The scheme provides financial assistance to persons with severe or multiple disabilities. It is a part of National Social Assistance Programme implemented by Ministry of Rural Development.
eligibility: Persons with 80% or more disability
Age between 18-79 years
BPL category
Not receiving pension from any other scheme
schemes.benefits: Monthly pension ranging from Rs. 300 to Rs. 500
schemes.applicationProcess: Apply through District Social Welfare Office or online portal
schemes.department: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
